column6: "SUPER HERO CIRCUS!" The hypnotic Ringmaster takes the center ring as he mesmerizes the Squaddies to think they are circus performers--keeping them busy while Doom's Lethal Legion attempts to retrieve some Fractals from the SHIELD Helicarrier!  Also, the gang enjoys a day at the beach in "SUPER SQUADDIE SUMMER FUN!" and Abomination and MODOK pay a visit to the Offices of Marble Comics in "BRING ON THE BAD GUYS!" which is pretty funny. All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Leonel Castellani | penciller:Marcelo DiChiara | writer:Todd Dezago
